Radar, vision and lidar are the eyes and ears of the car. #delphidrive
A lidar is an invisible safe laser system. It can point out objects during daytime as well as nighttime and measure distance. #delphidrive
A car's radar works like a bat.  It sends out waves and can detect objects in the dark through fog and rain. #delphidrive
A car's vision system is like human eyes, it can read street signs, follow lane markers and detect pedestrians and cyclists. #delphidrive
